Game.Name: G.G Series Collection Plus
Game.Plot: A compilation cartridge for DS featuring 30 G.G Series games -- 16 of which were originally released on DSiWare. Game List: Originals: The Last Knight Variable Arms Uippaa no Daibouken Kakure Ninja Kagemaru All Breaker Nyokki Shadow Army Score Attacker Harisen BON! Vector Yuusha Puzzle Run & Strike Uchuu Race!! Air Pinball Hockey DSiWare Releases: Energy Chain Conveyor Konpou Wonder Land Z.ONE Shinobi Karakuri-Den Chou Hero Ouga Tetsubou Drift Circuit Black x Block Vertex Dark Spirits D-Tank Assault Buster Drilling Attack!! Throw Out Exciting River
